item.description:
*** PLEASE NOTE *** To get drink specials, find Ben and get a bracelet from him when you arrive.
________________________________________________

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location: Black Bear Saloon.

Specials include:

- $3 domestic drafts and bottles (Bud, Bud Lite, Miller Lite)
- $4 all other draft and bottled beer
- $4 well drinks (excludes red bull drinks, long island iced teas, high-shelf stuff)
- $0.25 wings (min 12)

your contact for the night: Ben (203) 554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

*** Bring a friend***
item.name: 7/30 - Monday Happy Hour - Black Bear Saloon
